column1: After a whole year my school extestentialist club declared me... ...most likely to be
column3: The word be can mean to exist (first meaning) or to become (second meaning).
column4: I hope to be successful in my career.
column5: I want to be an artist one day.

column1: I never knew much about people until I took one apart, just to see how it works.
column3: The word works can refer to functioning correctly (first meaning) or a place of employment (second meaning).
column4: The machine works efficiently after the repairs.
column5: Many people commute to their works in the city.

column1: My neighbor is loud and obnoxious now I know how Canada feels
column3: The word loud can mean having a lot of volume or noise (first meaning) or it can describe someone openly expressing their personality (second meaning).
column4: The loud music kept everyone awake at the party.
column5: She has a loud personality that draws everyoneâ€™s attention.
